product_name: Thule Canyon Roof Top Basket Extension
long_description: Increase the storage space of your Thule Canyon roof basket with this low-profile extension. Tacking on an extra 20 inches of space, you'll have no problem hauling gear for a last minute RSVP.
short_description: Increase the storage space of your Thule Canyon roof basket with this low-profile extension. Tacking on an extra 20 inches of space, you'll have no problem hauling gear for a last minute RSVP.
